```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## 'pivot longer'
use pulse data
```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
pulse_data
```

wide format to long format
```{r}
pulse_data_tidy=
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to="bdi"
  )
pulse_data_tidy
```


rewrite, combine, and extend (to add a mutate)
```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to="bdi"
  ) %>% 
relocate(id,visit) %>% 
  mutate(visit=recode(visit,"bl"="00m"))

pulse_data
```
